column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §G10 Extra Realm Size§!, §Yinheritable§!, §Yfor the rest of the game§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] gains §Y1§! additional §Ypermanent§! §Yinheritable§! instance of the §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Permanent)"§! modifier.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §G100 Extra Realm Size§!, §Yinheritable§!, §Yfor the rest of the game§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] gains §Y10§! additional §Ypermanent§! §Yinheritable§! instances of the §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Permanent)"§! modifier.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §G10 Extra Realm Size§!, §Yinheritable§!, §Yfor 3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] gains §Y1§! additional §Yinheritable§! instance of the §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Temporary)"§! modifier, §Ylasting for 3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §G100 Extra Realm Size§!, §Yinheritable§!, §Yfor 3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] gains §Y10§! additional §Yinheritable§! instances of the §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Temporary)"§! modifier, §Ylasting for 3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Temporary)"§! modifiers will be §Gextended§!, so that they expire in §Y3 years' time§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Temporary)"§! and §Y"§M(ED:MP)§Y Realm Size Extra Limit (Permanent)"§! modifiers will be §Rrevoked§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s Realm Size, and all associated modifiers, will be §Yrecalculated§!.
